forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Fursday Fixes

comments.text: Hi all! We fixed the following in version 148.3 (you're on [version]). Thx everyone for bug reports!
The "Show distant things" setting (in Me -> ... -> More) works now! Thx Ferny!
The command "Rotate forward with 0" should now properly stop the rotation! Thx Murky!

thread.latestCommentText: The command "Rotate forward with 0" should now properly stop the rotation! Thx Murky!
